entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Clearwater
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:53 AM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.1°C
entry.summary:

Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 87 %

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle early this afternoon. Snow level near valley bottom. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of rain beginning in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 1000 metres in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023
